comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: These are seriously amazing but sheeeeesh is that price high. I know it probably took Max a ton of work to complete these, I'm not downplaying that at all.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on October 28, 2022, 06:52:22 PMThese are seriously amazing but sheeeeesh is that price high. I know it probably took Max a ton of work to complete these, I'm not downplaying that at all.  Yeah pretty sad about it. Dont think i can even swing the saphires.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Beautiful, thanks for sharing, I think if sats weren't so cheap these would go pretty quick

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on October 28, 2022, 07:14:07 PMBeautiful, thanks for sharing, I think if sats weren't so cheap these would go pretty quick  Their sold unfunded. Price is just the art. I love them. I think their great. Better start saving

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: Hookzup1 on October 28, 2022, 07:14:07 PMBeautiful, thanks for sharing, I think if sats weren't so cheap these would go pretty quickYeah if Bitcoin was $100,000 right now I would buy one in a heartbeat, but I just can't come to terms with spending 12 Million sats/.12BTCCheers to all the buyers!

comments.body: Quote from: BTCOVERFIATS on October 28, 2022, 07:49:34 PMQuote from: Hookzup1 on October 28, 2022, 07:14:07 PMBeautiful, thanks for sharing, I think if sats weren't so cheap these would go pretty quickYeah if Bitcoin was $100,000 right now I would buy one in a heartbeat, but I just can't come to terms with spending 12 Million sats/.12BTCCheers to all the buyers!I could not agree more!  This is definitely something to watch as the next bull run approaches.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on October 28, 2022, 07:51:09 PMQuote from: BTCOVERFIATS on October 28, 2022, 07:49:34 PMQuote from: Hookzup1 on October 28, 2022, 07:14:07 PMBeautiful, thanks for sharing, I think if sats weren't so cheap these would go pretty quickYeah if Bitcoin was $100,000 right now I would buy one in a heartbeat, but I just can't come to terms with spending 12 Million sats/.12BTCCheers to all the buyers!I could not agree more!  This is definitely something to watch as the next bull run approaches.  yeah 2 months of buying lealanas definitely dented the pocketbook. Ill be anxious to see how long it takes to sell out. If it does take awhile. Might be abke to make something happen.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: I think this is a smart move to make more intricate/expenses pieces as his work always sells out.  I am sure as BTC corrects these will too.   This also will likely continue to increase the value of his earlier work (I only have 2 pieces and an error coin, wish I had more).

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Love the design of this series - being a miner as well I love the asic incorporation but too expensive for me - I wish I had gotten into collectibles years earlier.Maybe one day, max will make another budget version  one can dream

comments.author: M-BTC
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 29, 2022, 02:30:35 AMLove the design of this series - being a miner as well I love the asic incorporation but too expensive for me - I wish I had gotten into collectibles years earlier.Maybe one day, max will make another budget version  one can dreamI'm a bit on the fence on this one, the design of the robots feels a bit like a swing and miss. Using an Antminer chip is an amazing idea but the rest looks a bit meh (for example using keychain clips as arms). Would've looked much better if the robot was entirely made from Antminer parts imo.

comments.author: 123Dave
comments.body: Quote from: M-BTC on October 29, 2022, 07:24:35 AMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 29, 2022, 02:30:35 AMLove the design of this series - being a miner as well I love the asic incorporation but too expensive for me - I wish I had gotten into collectibles years earlier.Maybe one day, max will make another budget version  one can dreamI'm a bit on the fence on this one, the design of the robots feels a bit like a swing and miss. Using an Antminer chip is an amazing idea but the rest looks a bit meh (for example using keychain clips as arms). Would've looked much better if the robot was entirely made from Antminer parts imo.I was on the fence about the arms as well, but when you read what he envisioned the miner in grabbing the zeros to solve the block. Not sure what parts on an ant miner could have filled that. But little hook hands are perfect.

comments.author: Honeybadger2014
comments.body: that is probably my favorite Kialara so far.  lots of meaning and i kinda like how the little robot looks.  I always thought sapphires were blue though?!?
